name: testScopeJunior_AppointmentVisibility
description: UI: junior worker create appointment ->login as readonly worker and verify invisibility of appointment ->login as admin worker and verify invisibility of appointment
descriptionHtml: UI: junior worker create appointment ->login as readonly worker and verify invisibility of appointment ->login as admin worker and verify invisibility of appointment

testStage.description: UI: junior worker create appointment ->login as readonly worker and verify invisibility of appointment ->login as admin worker and verify invisibility of appointment

steps.name: Preconditions: change calendar view -> create client & service -> create appointment -> delete appointment
API: change calendar view and cell duration
matcher: extract value from response HTML

parameters.name: response

steps.name: API: create client & service within Junior account

parameters.name: client
parameters.value: ClientCreateRequest(is_filling_up_sent=false, status=NNrxqMGQpZ, permitAds=true, birthdate=06-26, birthyear=1990, address=05169 Bechtelar Field, Emmerichville, GA 45705, debts=[{"date":"2023-05-14 23:33:23","desc":"qtBsgwFhj7","sum":384565297}], phone=["0500-08-59-45"], email=chan.gutkowski@gmail.com, notes=[{"added":"2023-05-14 23:33:23","text":"vFMUDYeho5"}], name=Mr. Eloisa Metz, gender=male)

parameters.name: simpleService
parameters.value: ServiceCreateRequest(serviceID=1167743240, serviceName=Felton Dibbert MD_503.812.6603_2023-05-14, serviceDuration=18, price=31, color=F6gPudURtR, categoryID=1352061200, added=2023-05-14 23:33:23, category=ServiceCreateRequest.CategoryRequestCreate(categoryName=N3Kw6OhsTr, id=VBEJIB6YiS))

parameters.name: serviceByName

steps.name: API: create appointment within Junior account

parameters.name: client
